price: Гарчи жиноятчилар ёқтирмасалар-да, Аллоҳ Ўз сўзлари билан ҳақни рўёбга чиқарур.
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
